DESCRIPTION: Create a new card from a selection of #yCores and add it to your hand and deck.
#yBurning creatures take additional damage when attacked. At the end of their turn, #yBurn deals damage and then is removed.
#yLinked cards are drawn and played together, and cost 1 [E] more for each card #yLinked to them.
Determines the effect and abilities of a card.
Provides #yEnergy, #yFireballs, and #ySnowballs each turn, based on its temperature. Temperature ranges from #yFrozen to #yOverheated.
A #yToken Attack that applies Burn.
Frostbitten creatures take double damage.
Deals additional damage for each #ySnowball and #yEvaporated card you have.
If this card would #yEvaporate, discard it instead.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile when it is played.
An accumulating resource that remains between turns and can be converted to #yEnergy.
Chilled creatures deal less damage this turn.
Tinkering a card removes it from play and provides #ySpare #yParts which #yUpgrades drawn cards. Additional #yParts are obtained when Tinkering an #yUpgraded card.
Modifies the abilities of a card.
A card made from 1 #yCore and 1 #yPart.
A card made from 2 #yCores and 1 #yPart.
A card made from 2 #yCores and 2 #yParts.
Effect is lost at the end of this turn.
Is not shuffled into your deck at the start of combat. Cannot be removed from your deck. Upgrades affect all newly created instances of this #yToken.
The card's main non-damage and non-Block related effect.
Requires and consumes #ySnowballs to trigger an extra effect.

Gain [E] . #yEvaporate.
#yRetain. Draw a card.
#yCondense a card. NL #yCold: #yRetain. Draw a card.
Removed until the end of combat, or until #yCondensed.
Shuffle a random #yEvaporated card into your draw pile.
Raise a card's temperature. Temperature ranges from #yFrozen to #yOverheated.
Maximize a card's temperature. Temperature ranges from #yFrozen to #yOverheated.
Lower a card's temperature. Temperature ranges from #yFrozen to #yOverheated.
Lower a card's temperature until it is #yFrozen. Temperature ranges from #yFrozen to #yOverheated.
Gain [E]
Temperature with no effects. Temperature ranges from #yFrozen to #yOverheated.
Receive half damage from #yAttacks this turn.
Normal temperature.
The next card you play this turn costs 0 and #yEvaporates.
If #yHoliday #yCheer is greater than an enemy's current HP, they go home for the holidays and increase #yChristmas #ySpirit by 1.
If you end combat without killing anyone, heal HP and gain Gold equal to your #yChristmas #ySpirit, and gain an additional card from this combat's card reward.
Solved cards cost #b0 this combat.
If this card is in your hand at the end of the turn, lower this card's cost by #b1 this combat.
Move the top card of your draw pile to your hand.
Fluxed cards act as if they are also their opposite temperature.
Ignores block.
#yUpgrades drawn cards for the rest of combat.
